comment: * Thrown when an internal codec error occurs.

variables.name: ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_RESOURCE
variables.comment: * This indicates required resource was not able to be allocated.

variables.name: ERROR_RECLAIMED
variables.comment:
* This indicates the resource manager reclaimed the media resource used by the codec. *

* With this exception, the codec must be released, as it has moved to terminal state.

variables.name: ACTION_TRANSIENT
variables.comment: Must be in sync with android_media_MediaCodec.cpp

methods.name: public boolean isTransient()
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the codec exception is a transient issue,
         * perhaps due to resource constraints, and that the method
         * (or encoding/decoding) may be retried at a later time.

methods.name: public boolean isRecoverable()
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the codec cannot proceed further,
         * but can be recovered by stopping, configuring,
         * and starting again.

methods.name: public int getErrorCode()
methods.comment: * Retrieve the error code associated with a CodecException

methods.name: public String getDiagnosticInfo()
methods.comment:
* Retrieve a developer-readable diagnostic information string
         * associated with the exception. Do not show this to end-users,
         * since this string will not be localized or generally
         * comprehensible to end-users.
